title: Independent Talent Skills Fueling Economic Recovery
itunes:title: Independent Talent Skills Fueling Economic Recovery
description:
Jody Greenstone Miller, Co-CEO at Business Talent Group, discusses the BTG 2021 Skills Index results which show that demand for high-caliber independent skills has skyrocketed in a tight labor market.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
